body:
Which version of gRPC?

We haven't enabled ubsan yet, but a few of us have been chipping away at
problems.

On Thu, May 4, 2017 at 2:22 PM Feng Li <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Gets following errors when start a GRPC server with ubsan.
>
> I0504 14:17:53.823168591 546962 server_builder.cc:247] Synchronous server.
> Num CQs: 1, Min pollers: 1, Max Pollers: 2147483647, CQ timeout (msec): 1000
> third_party/grpc/src/core/lib/support/stack_lockfree.c:140:15: runtime
> error: left shift of 1 by 63 places cannot be represented in type 'gpr_atm'
> (aka 'long')
> #0 0x7f3e47d59f5e in gpr_stack_lockfree_push
> third_party/grpc/src/core/lib/support/stack_lockfree.c:140:15
> #1 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/1> 0x7f3e4768d18a in
> grpc_server_start third_party/grpc/src/core/lib/surface/server.c:1104:7
> #2 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/2> 0x7f3e481dc381 in
> grpc::Server::Start(grpc::ServerCompletionQueue**, unsigned long)
> third_party/grpc/src/cpp/server/server_cc.cc:516:3
> #3 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3> 0x7f3e481c098a in
> grpc::ServerBuilder::BuildAndStart()
> third_party/grpc/src/cpp/server/server_builder.cc:340:16
> #4 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/4> 0x7f3e491c0248 in
> grpc::gateway::testing::EchoServer::Start()
> net/grpc/gateway/testing/interop/grpc/echo_server.cc:22:21
> #5 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/5> 0x551024 in
> grpc::gateway::testing::TestEnvironment::SetUp()
> net/grpc/gateway/testing/interop/grpc/grpc_web_grpc_interop_test.cc:65:13
> #6 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/6> 0x7f3e485bfbb5 in void (
> *std::for_each<__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<testing::Environment* const*,
> std::vector<testing::Environment*, std::allocatortesting::Environment* > >,
> void (*)(testing::Environment*)>(__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<testing::Environment*
> const*, std::vector<testing::Environment*,
> std::allocatortesting::Environment* > >,
> __gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<testing::Environment* const*,
> std::vector<testing::Environment*, std::allocatortesting::Environment* > >,
> void (*)(testing::Environment*)))(testing::Environment*)
> #7 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/7> 0x7f3e48580ab4 in
> testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests()
> third_party/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4683:7
> #8 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/8> 0x7f3e48580534 in
> testing::UnitTest::Run() third_party/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4304:10
> #9 <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/9> 0x53444e in main
> net/grpc/gateway/testing/interop/grpc/grpc_web_grpc_interop_test.cc:533:10
>
> SUMMARY: UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer: invalid-shift-base
> third_party/grpc/src/core/lib/support/stack_lockfree.c:140:15
>
> â€”
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/10998>, or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AJpudZMv78a6A5VEjsX-eU0pZpmWG7RSks5r2kGbgaJpZM4NRPEi>
> .
>
This is definitely not an issue at master. This was some old debug code (ironically) removed in #10747
Yes, it's on our internal p4 head. Happy to know it has been resolved on github. We would just wait for next import.
